channel.title: The Newswomen's Club of New York
channel.description: The Newswomen's Club of New York

item.title: The Front Page Awards
item.description:
The Front Page Awards

A host of legendary reporters formed the reception committee at a Front Page Ball attended by Margaret Truman (far left).

item.title: MissionThe Newswomen’s Club of New York is the only professional organization exclusively for women journalists in the New York metropolitan area. Our membership includes women who work in newspapers, magazines, radio, television, photography and new med
